Today is rose day …
Happy rose day 2 aal.
When I was a boy,
The Sioux owned the world.
The sun rose & set on their..
They sent ten thousand men to battle.
Where r the warriors today?
Who slew them???
Where r our lands???
Who owns them???
By:::: Sitting Bull
